trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fairbanks
There were no other sightings in Fairbanks on or around March 16th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was blue shaped like a football and had two circles in center, the center circle was blue and had a white ring around it. It was silent and flew over Fairbanks Alaska at 12:51 am and was in full view for one minute then flew very fast towards the north east of Fairbanks, I chased it with my car but gave up very quickly after reaching 90mph and it was very obvious I never had a chance to keep up. I do not think our fastest jets could have touched this thing! It went so fast it it was like it just faded away ........... I saw it fly over going towards the north east of Fairbanks I was leaving Walmart when I first seen it, I could not help but see it because of the size and color I knew it was not a plane or helicopter. I was scared at first then I got very excited but really was wishing for my video camera and regular camera which I will carry every where I go now.
Summary: Blue football pointed both ends round in mid. Blue circle in center w/white ring around it.
